General.Name: Intikeramik Alamasri Industri
General.Description: PT Intikeramik Alamasri Industri Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and sells porcelain tiles under the Essenza brand in Indonesia and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Ceramic Production and Sales; and Hotel Services. It also engages in the hospitality business. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

3.Name: Ms. Winda Yohana Marieska CHRP, S.E.
3.Title: Head of Human Resource, Corp. Sec. & Legal
